results.label: Lionel Messi
results.description: Argentine professional footballer who plays as a forward for Ligue 1 club Paris Saint-Germain and captains the Argentina national team.

results.label: Cristiano Ronaldo
results.description: Portuguese professional footballer who plays as a forward for Saudi Professional League club Al Nassr and captains the Portugal national team.

results.label: Kylian Mbappé
results.description: French professional footballer who plays as a forward for Real Madrid and the France national team.
